data.name: The Fractured Room
data.description: Solve puzzles and try to escape from the fractured hotel room where you can experience weird anomalies. Find out what really happened in that room and escape before it is too late!

We're thrilled to announce the final release of "The Fractured Room," now at Version 1.0. This update brings a fully implemented story, bug fixes, and extensive gameplay and visual refinements.


Players can now dive headfirst into an immersive narrative that seamlessly integrates with the gameplay. The game's visuals have been enhanced, promising a more captivating experience.


Stay tuned for the upcoming Quest 3 graphics update and physics fine-tuning in the next release, as we continue to elevate your VR gaming adventure.

We're excited to share the latest updates on "The Fracture Room," our immersive VR game. Phase 3 is now complete, bringing us one step closer to delivering a thrilling escape room experience. Here's a quick overview of the progress made:

Puzzles Galore: In Phase 3, we've implemented all the puzzles, save for the final one, which will be intricately tied to the game's narrative. We've carefully designed these challenges to test players' wit, creativity, and problem-solving skills. Each puzzle presents a unique twist and will require players to think outside the box.

Bug Squashing: We've been hard at work addressing various bugs and issues that have cropped up during development. Our goal is to provide players with a seamless and enjoyable experience, free from any frustrating hiccups.

Performance Boost: We understand the importance of smooth gameplay in VR, and that's why we've been working tirelessly to enhance performance. With these improvements, players can expect a more stable frame rate, ensuring an immersive and nausea-free experience.

Seamless Navigation: We've introduced smooth turning to make navigation within the VR world even more comfortable. This addition not only increases player comfort but also adds an extra layer of immersion.

With Phase 3 complete, we're now gearing up for the final push to wrap up the game. We can't wait to see players dive into "The Fracture Room" and experience the challenging puzzles, the gripping narrative, and the immersive VR environment. Stay tuned for more updates as we approach the game's final release. Thank you for your continued support!
